name: Frontier VR
description: Frontier is a room-scale sandbox where you can enjoy a simple, colorful and immersive visit to the wild west! Play with guns and animals in three stylized environments in virtual reality.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: i5 range or similar Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or similar (VR capable) Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: i7 4770 or similar Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 or similar Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
